metadata.description: Linked Templates base url
DSC Scripts base url
Location of the main Datacenter
Location of the DR Datacenter
Common prefix which will compose the name of all the resource group resources
Prefix for main datacenter resources which are created with fixed names
Prefix for DR datacenter resources which are created with fixed names
The name of Sql Server Storage Account
The type of the Sql Server Storage Account created
The name of DC Storage Account
The type of the DC Storage Account created
The name of File Server Storage Account
The name of diagnostic Storage Account
The address range of the main datacenter VNET in CIDR format
The address range of the main datacenter subnet static IPs are allocated from in the new VNET
The address range of the main datacenter SQL subnet created in the new VNET
The address range of the main datacenter Gateway subnet created in the new VNET
The address range of the DR datacenter VNET in CIDR format
The address range of the DR datacenter subnet static IPs are allocated from in the new VNET
The address range of the DR datacenter SQL subnet created in the new VNET
The address range of the DR datacenter Gateway subnet created in the new VNET
The preshared key used to establish vNet to vNet VPN
The IP address of the new AD VM
The IP address of the new backup AD VM
The IP address of the main datacenter SQL Server Internal Load Balancer
The IP address of the DR datacenter SQL Server Internal Load Balancer
The size of the AD VMs Created
The size of the Witness VM Created
The size of the SQL VMs Created
The FQDN of the AD Domain created
The name of the Administrator of the new VMs and Domain
The password for the Administrator account of the new VMs and Domain
The SQL Server Service Account name
The SQL Server Service Account password
The day of a week for auto patching
The start hour of a day for auto patching
The Sql Server Version
The Sql Server edition - Enterprise or Developer (SQL2016 only)
The Sql VM work load type: GENERAL - general work load; DW - datawear house work load; OLTP - Transactional processing work load

resources.name: mainStorageAccountVirtualNetworkPublicIP
resources.comments: This resource will create storage accounts for Active Directory, SQL Server, File Share Witness and Diagnostics on main datacenter. It will also create the Virtual Network and public IP addresses

resources.name: drStorageAccountVirtualNetworkPublicIP
resources.comments: This resource will create storage accounts for Active Directory, SQL Server, File Share Witness and Diagnostics on main datacenter. It will also create the Virtual Network and public IP addresses

resources.name: vNet2vNetInfrastructure
resources.comments: This resource will create VNET Gateways and implement VNET to VNET VPN

resources.name: mainLoadBalancers
resources.comments: Create Load Balancers for SQL on main datacenter

resources.name: drLoadBalancers
resources.comments: Create Load Balancers for SQL on DR datacenter
